title: Lessons From Older Athletes
teaser: Is it possible to be in the best shape of your life...after the age of 50? What about running marathons...or 100-mile ultramarathons...at the age of 65? Joy Cardin's guest author says women are achieving amazing levels of fitness well into their 60s, 70s, and even 80s, and what lessons they offer all athletes.
